SQL.LOAD:
SELECT dealer_id, manufacturer_id, model, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, deduct_by_mfg_id, deductible FROM elp_deduct_by_mfg
WHERE deduct_by_mfg_id = :deduct_by_mfg_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT mfgc.deduct_by_mfg_id, dlr.dealer || ' - ' || dlr.dealer_name dealer_name, dlr.dealer_id, mfr.description manufacturer, mfr.manufacturer_id, mfgc.model, mfgc.deductible FROM elp_deduct_by_mfg mfgc, elp_dealer dlr, elp_manufacturer mfr WHERE mfr.company_group_Id = :company_group_id and mfr.manufacturer_id = mfgc.manufacturer_id and dlr.dealer_id = mfgc.dealer_id --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY UPPER(dealer), UPPER(manufacturer)
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_deduct_by_mfg SET dealer_id = :dealer_id, manufacturer_id = :manufacturer_id, model = :model, modified_by = :modified_by, deductible = :deductible WHERE deduct_by_mfg_id = :deduct_by_mfg_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_deduct_by_mfg ( dealer_id, manufacturer_id, model, created_by, deduct_by_mfg_id, deductible ) VALUES ( :dealer_id, :manufacturer_id, :model, :created_by, :deduct_by_mfg_id, :deductible )
